name: pnp-copilot-pro-dev-da-HRHelpdesk
title: HR Heldpdesk Declarative Agent
shortDescription: HR Helpdesk is a template Declarative Agent designed to help employees troubleshoot their issues using insights from ServiceNow KB, and if not successful create a case in the right Centre of Excellence/table without much burden on the end user.
longDescription: HR Helpdesk is a template Declarative Agent designed to help employees troubleshoot their issues using insights from ServiceNow KB, and if not successful create a case in the right Centre of Excellence/table without much burden on the end user.
